item.title: Starting Task Warrior
item.description: I’ve recently started using Task Warrior, a command line application that helps to track and manage your todo list. With simple commands like task ls, task add Task Name Here, and task 10 done, you can list, add, and complete tasks in your task list, but the application is built with flexibility in mind. There’s an optional backend server which serves an api that the cli and 3rd party applications can utilize, allowing cross platform task syncing across machines and devices.
